name: Sheet Pan Chicken Souvlaki

ingredients.name: boneless, skinless chicken breasts, pork, or lamb, cut into strips

preparation: Preheat oven to 400° F. Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner.
Place chicken and peppers in a bowl; add seasoning and oil. Using the 2-in-1 Citrus Press squeeze in 2 tbsp juice from lemon. Stir to mix.
Spread out on prepared pan. Roast until chicken is cooked through and peppers are tender, 15 min.
Serve in warm pitas with Classic Greek Salad and Dillicious Tzatziki.
tips: Wrap pita bread in foil; warm in the oven for last 7–10 min of roasting.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 cup baby spinach or seasonal, mixed veggies, or 2 tbsp prepared Dillicious Tzatziki and 1 serving prepared Classic Greek Salad.
